Class HexBorder

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.export.Savable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class HexBorder
extends com.jme3.scene.Mesh

Visual-Computing Praktikum - Aufgabe 2

Defines a LineLoop Mesh to draw the outline of a single hexagon.

Author:
Bernd Späth, Wladimir Spindler and Saman Sedighi Rad

Method Detail

collideWith

public int collideWith(com.jme3.collision.Collidable other,
                       com.jme3.math.Matrix4f worldMatrix,
                       com.jme3.bounding.BoundingVolume worldBound,
                       com.jme3.collision.CollisionResults results)
We override the this collision callback to prevent that the HexBorder is part of the collision detection, not overriding this method leads in this case to an exception.
